arrays.description:
The Network settings for the Pure Storage arrays.

Required fields are:
  * array_type
  * hostname
  * ct0
  * ct1
  * vip
arrays.title: Individual Array Networking

array_type.description:
Default is 'FlashArray'.  Type of Flash array to configure

Valid values are:
  * FlashArray
  * FlashBlade
array_type.title: Type of Flash Array

dns.description:
This dictionary is for DNS settings for Pure Storage.

Required fields are:
  * domain
  * name_servers
dns.title: DNS settings for Pure Storage

domain.description: Domain Name for the Pure Storage system.
domain.title: Domain Name

name_servers.description: List of DNS Servers to add to the arrays.
name_servers.title: DNS Servers

eula_acceptance.description:
This EULA must be accepted as part of the initial deployment.

Required fields are:
  * full_name
  * job_title
  * organization
eula_acceptance.title: EULA Acceptance

full_name.description: Full Name of the individual accepting the EULA.
full_name.title: Full Name

job_title.description: Job Title of the individual accepting the EULA.
job_title.title: Job Title

organization.description: Company Name / Organization accepting the EULA.
organization.title: Company Name/Organization

networking.description:
This dictionary provides the network settings for zero touch provision of Pure Storage.

Required fields are:
  * arrays
  * gateway
  * netmask
networking.title: Pure Array Networking

arrays.description:
List of Storage Arrays and their respective network configuration

Required Attributes:
  * name

Optional Attributes:
arrays.title: Individual Array Networking

pure_storage.description:
This dictionary provides Pure Storage.

Optional field are:
  * zero_touch_provisioning
pure_storage.title: Pure Storage - Zero touch provisioning

smtp.description:
The Network settings for the Pure Storage arrays.

Required fields are:
  * array_type
  * hostname
  * ct0
  * ct1
  * vip
smtp.title: SMTP settings for the Pure Storage arrays

alert_emails.description: List of email addresses to send alerts to.
alert_emails.title: Mail Alert Recipients

relay_host.description: List of NTP Servers to add to the arrays.
relay_host.title: SMTP Relay Server

time.description:
This dictionary provides the basic setup for zero touch provision of Pure Storage.

Required fields are:
  * dns
  * eula_acceptance
  * networking
  * smtp
  * time
time.title: Time settings for the Pure Storage arrays

ntp_servers.description: List of NTP Servers to add to the arrays.
ntp_servers.title: NTP Servers

zero_touch_provisioning.description:
This dictionary provides the basic setup for zero touch provision of Pure Storage.

Required fields are:
  * dns
  * eula_acceptance
  * networking
  * smtp
  * time
zero_touch_provisioning.title: Pure Storage - Zero touch provisioning
